item.description:
Welcome to the first meeting of the Boston Marketing Learning Group!

The first Boston Marketing Learning Group will be about Internet Marketing with the following agenda:

7PM - 7:30PM - Business Card Swap & Introductions.

7:30PM - 8:30PM - How to use the various aspects of internet marketing to drive business.
Open discussion by, Boston Internet Marketing Company, Brick Marketing President, Nick Stamoulis

8:30PM - 9PM - Open Discussion About Internet Marketing

Please sign up to this event, this Boston Marketing Learning Group meeting is FREE and open for EVERYONE in the Boston area. As time gets closer I will email out the local Boston area location for our first meeting.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one speaking about internet marketing!
item.name: Boston Marketing Learning Group
